sense.gloss: to understand, to comprehend, to grasp, to see, to get, to follow
to become clear, to be known, to be discovered, to be realized, to be realised, to be found out
I know!, I think so too!

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓には↑何↑↓なに↓が↑起↑↓お↓こるか|↑分↑↓わ↓かる|んじゃないかと↑思↑↓おも↓うけどね。
sdata.e: You can probably guess what happens though.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓が↑次↑↓つぎ↓に|↑分↑↓わ↓かる|ことは↑君↑↓きみ↓が↑新聞↑↓しんぶん↓に↑載↑↓の↓るってことだ。
sdata.e: Next thing you know, you'll be in the papers.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓がロボットではないってことは|↑分↑↓わ↓かる|。
sdata.e: It only shows you're not a robot.

sdata.j: ↑世↑↓よ↓の↑中↑↓なか↓には10↑種類↑↓しゅるい↓の↑人間↑↓にんげん↓がいる。↑二進法↑↓にしんほう↓が|↑分↑↓わ↓かる|↑者↑↓もの↓と↑分↑↓わ↓からない↑者↑↓もの↓だ。
sdata.e: There are 10 types of people in the world: those who understand binary, and those who don't.

sdata.e: You are old enough to understand this.
